## FeedManager.createFeedFromFile() method

Create an RSS feed Markdown representaiton from a local XML file.

The Markdown representation consists of - a feed dashboard - a directory whic has the same name as the dashboard (without the .md extension) containing the RSS items of the feed,

The file system layout of an Obsidian RSS feed looks like this: \~\~\~ ğŸ“‚ â”œâ”€ <feedname>.md â† dashboard â•°â”€ ğŸ“‚<feedname> â”œâ”€ <item-1>.md â”œâ”€ â€¦ â•°â”€ <item-n>.md \~\~\~

âš  the base url to make relative urls absolute is synthesized as `https://localhost`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
createFeedFromFile(xml: TFile): Promise<RSSfeedAdapter>;
```
